title: Assimilate! (A Party Game)
notes: Steam has 8 reviews (no score). SteamDB shows 72.86% positive (18 reviews); small sample keeps score around 70. Steam store shows 8 user reviews and lists Shared/Split Screen PvP/Co-op; supports HTML5 devices.
raw_comment: Deduction party game. Human team vs robot team. 5-10 players. Phones/tablets/browsers as controllers. Separate screens.
